title: @ Riot Games
body: i dont know what happened but was playing a ranked game when my game just dropped, when i tried to reconnect i could not. It keeps saying cannot connect to internet through firewall, ive done everything and changed everything ive even looked up videos, their is nothing wrong with my firewall therefore they must be something wrong with the game, i think it is unfair i should lose a ranked game for something you cant not fix. If this is a constant problem you should be able to find a soultion for it.

replies.body: Are you able to reproduce this issue?
How did you do it? I'd like to know, just for future reference.
I resetted my router for 3mins and restarted my computer.
